about_the_game:
In a distant parallel world, there is a city called Gugu, where the legend of the "Chicken God" has been passed down since ancient times. According to the legend, whenever hunger and disaster strike, the "Chicken God" will reappear in the human world. With his exquisite and unparalleled cooking skills, he will feed the citizens of Gugu repeatedly and quell the disasters time and time again. However, as time passed, the power of the 'Chicken God' gradually weakened, and the gluttonous monsters hidden in another dimension began to stir again. In response to the upcoming crisis, the 'Chicken God' used its last strength to send a mysterious message to all parallel worlds that only the 'Kun Clan' could accept. No one knows whether this will be a trial from the 'Chicken God' or a self redemption for Kun Kun. In short, Kun Kun's great adventure is about to begin!

Kunkun Adventure "is a Q-version cartoon style ARPG role-playing game. In the game, players can operate our protagonist Kunkun to freely explore a semi open city in Gugu, and learn about the hidden dangers of the city during the exploration process. It's time to pick up our basketball to save the city.

◆ Game Features ◆

*Classic cartoon 2D style game map

*Simple 2D controls, moving and running, sprinting and attacking, throwing basketball

*Explore semi open city maps and various daily buildings

*Create your own adventure journey! You can freely choose whether to constantly collect and explore or to keep fighting

*Continuously acquire new skills! Exercise ball skills, improve attributes, and showcase the strength of practicing for two and a half years

*2D frame by frame animation brings vitality to countless adorable characters

*Dozens of enemies! Epic bosses with unique features! Experience the charm of cartoon style K-pop culture.

*Cute little animals, loyal companions, go choose your favorite pet and embark on an adventure together

Welcome all players to join the official QQ discussion group: 598682269

In addition, we are seeking independent game publishing cooperation.

Explore hidden crises in the city, fight against evil monsters with basketballs, adopt cute and powerful pets, and the entire game is in a classic hand drawn 2D style.
